document_data.caption: A map showing the Singed Bolt outlined in red.
document_data.name: Singed Bolt
document_data.mainbody: The '''Singed Bolt''' was a [[tavern]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The tavern stood two stories tall.
document_data.Location: The Singed Bolt was located in the southern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] on the northeast corner of where [[River Street]] joined the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Dead Trades Ward}}
